pages.title: Kamen Rider KickHopper
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Kabuto (2006, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:kabuto/devices/zect_buckle#kickhopper_rider_belt)ZECT Buckle (KickHopper)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed IV$(li)Resistance III$(li)Haste V$(li)Jump Boost VIII$(li)Strength IV
